Articles.Content:
Wow.... this is still alive? And you've written an asm os? and... a "looks like c" compiler? Are you crazy?

I really should check this out again

Wow.... this is still alive? And you've written an asm os? and... a "looks like c" compiler? Are you crazy?

I really should check this out again

It's not dead yet. Yes, though it is very rudimentary. Yes, but the syntax is quite different from c. Maybe.

If you have any further questions I'll be happy to answer them
